==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=irr|sort=おっす}}

===Etymology===
A contraction of {{m|ja|おはようございます|tr=ohayō gozaimasu||good morning|pos=also said when first meeting a commonly-met acquaintance for the first time that day}}. First used in the {{w|Budo Senmon Gakko}}, later among other martial artists.<ref>{{pedia|押忍|lang=ja}}</ref> {{attention|ja}}

The kanji spelling is an example of {{ateji|sort=おっす}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=irr|おっす|acc=1}}

===Interjection===
{{ja-pos|interjection|おっす}}

# {{l|en|hey}}, {{l|en|yo}}!
# yes sir!
